8269.quoteText:
1.
We do not (and will never) sell, license, sub-license or share any of the data submitted directly or indirectly by our users with any person or entity.
8269.title: The service does not share user information with third parties

tosdr.case: The service does not share user information with third parties

8270.quoteText:
2.
When the service comes into contact with user data that shall not be logged, it is discarded as quickly as possible.
8270.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

8271.quoteText:
3.
If not specifically requested by the user, no data is logged.
Some features require some sort of data retention.
In that case, our users are given the option, control, and full access on what is logged and for how long.
8271.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

tosdr.case: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

8272.quoteText: For example, when answering a DNS request sent to our server in Paris, the server will discard the request and response data as soon as the response was sent back to the user.
8272.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

8275.quoteText: We protect our users from privacy exposure to other services that we must interact with in order to operate properly.For example, we enforce Query Name Minimisation and we do not forward our users IP subnets to the authoritative name servers when EDNS Client Subnet has been disabled.
8275.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

10293.quoteText:
1.
We do not (and will never) sell, license, sub-license or share any of the data submitted directly or indirectly by our users with any person or entity.
10293.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data
